summary: Implements a custom diffusion pipeline that interprets prompts containing wildcard placeholders, expands them using supplied word lists or external files, and then runs the Stable Diffusion model (VAE, CLIP encoder, UNet, scheduler) to generate images, optionally applying safety checks.
business_intent: Enable users to create diverse sets of images from a single template prompt by varying parts of the text, supporting creative exploration, marketing material generation, and research experiments that require batch image synthesis with controlled variability.
